name: Skeleton Hunt
description:
Skeleton Hunt Game
Kill all the Skeleton present in scene to complete the Level.

Created using Flutter and Flame Engine and created for Midyear 2022 Flame Game Jam

Controls
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
W - Attack
Space - Jump
R - Pause/Resume

Background Music
https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/video-game/

Assets Used
Author : Agnel Selvan
Created Using: https://minisprit.es/#

Fonts Used
https://www.fontspace.com/pixeloid-font-f69232

Github Link
https://github.com/AgnelSelvan/skeleton_hunt.git
